These checks will be repeated 
at intervals throughout your 
labour.
If you and your partner have 
birth preferences, show your 
midwife so that she knows 
what kind of labour you want 
and can help you to achieve it.
What happens in labour
There are three stages to 
labour.	In	the	first	stage	the	
cervix gradually opens up 
(dilates). In the second stage
